meaningMnemonic: <radical>Flowers</radical> are <radical>mysterious</radical>ly appearing in the <radical>rice paddy</radical>. No matter what you do to them, they continue to <kanji>amass</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: As the flowers <kanji>amass</kanji> it starts attracting wildlife. Soon thousands of baby <reading>chick</reading>s (ちく) are amassing in the rice paddy as well.
